definition: specific to a particular stage (of a project etc)/interim (policy etc)/occurring in stages/phased
steps/flight of steps/step (over obstacle)/fig. way out of an embarrassing situation/bench (geology)
flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone

sentences.english: Given a positive odd number n, the output magic squares of order n.
sentences.chinese: 给定一个正奇数n，输出n阶幻方。

sentences.english: A quasilinear equation is one in which the highest-order derivative appears linearly .
sentences.chinese: 最高阶导数线性地出现的那种方程是准线性方程。

sentences.english: What are the special characteristics of a (multi-level) order report?
sentences.chinese: 一个多阶订单报表的特有特性是什么？

sentences.english: In this way, several samples for volume table construction can be obtained from one sample tree.
sentences.chinese: 一株样木可获得龄阶数个编表样本。

sentences.english: Present a definition of cepstrum based on Fractional Fourier Transform.
sentences.chinese: 给出了基于分数阶傅立叶变换的倒谱。

sentences.english: The wealth of the monasteries rested in the hands of small numbers of high-ranking lamas.
sentences.chinese: 寺院的财富掌握在少数高品阶的喇嘛手中。

sentences.english: Noise, High frequency, 8th Order Linear Phase Lowpass Filter.
sentences.chinese: 噪声，高频率，8阶线性相位低通滤波器。

sentences.english: In the region the Middle Triassic Anisic Stage stratigraphic development and facies variation are rather violent.
sentences.chinese: 区内三迭系中统安尼锡克阶地层发育，相变剧烈。

sentences.english: One is the asymptotic nature with the solution of small fractional damping oscillator.
sentences.chinese: 一类是具有小分数阶阻尼振子解的渐近性。

sentences.english: The approximation estimates of spherical functions by linder operators are given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了线性算子逼近球面函数的逼近阶。

sentences.english: The number distribution of diameter grade obeys normal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 雷竹株数按径阶分布服从正态分布。

sentences.english: A new method of constructing magic squares of any order has been put forward.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种通过计算构作任意阶幻方的新方法。

sentences.english: He cannot rise; he will remain third class, however rich he is.
sentences.chinese: 无论多富有，他不能往上升，他还是留在第三阶。

sentences.english: Unless destroy a magical power rank, Grey UGG Boots, probably just can thoroughly put on Yin spirit.
sentences.chinese: 除非突破神通阶，或许才能彻底抹去阴气吧。

sentences.english: This step-by-step correspondence of pediments and terraces is consistent in the region.
sentences.chinese: 麓原面与阶地面逐级对应关系具有区域一致性。

sentences.english: In this paper, an one-dimensional fractional percolation equation with variable coefficients is considered.
sentences.chinese: 考虑一个含有变系数的一维分数阶渗透方程。

definition: the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
variant of 巔峰|巅峰[dian1 feng1]
